body.div:
namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhaga
vā ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharati subhagavane sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi
bhikkhavo ti bhaddante ti te bhikkhu bhagavato paccasosuṃ tagavā etadavoca sabbadhammamūla
pariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmi
ti evaṃ bhante ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccasosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca
idha bhikkhave a
sutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avini
to sappurissānaṃ adassāvi sappurisadhammassa akovido asappurisadhamme avinito pathaviṃ
pathavito sañjānāti pathaviṃ pathavito saññatvā pathaviṃ maññati pathaviyā maññati pathavi
to maññati pathaviṃ meti maññati pathaviṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātītaṃ tassā
ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato saññatvā āpaṃ maññati ā
pasmiṃ maññati āpato maññati āpaṃ meti maññati āpaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apari
ññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato sañjānāti tejaṃ tejato saññatvā tejaṃ mañña
ti tejasmiṃ maññati tejato maññati tejaṃ meti maññati tejaṃ abhinandati tī kissa he
tu apariññātaṃ tassa ti vadāmi vāyaṃ vāyato sañjānāti vāyaṃ vāyato saṃññatvā vā
yaṃ maññati vāyasmi maññaṃti vāyato maññati vāyaṃ meti maññati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ ki
ssa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
bhūte bhūtato sañjānāti bhūte bhūta
to saññatvā bhute maññati bhūtesu maññati bhūtato maññati bhūte meti maññati bhū
te abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi deve devato sañjānā
ti deve devato saṃmaññatvā deve maññati devesu maññati devato maññati deve me
ti maññati deve abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ
pajāpatito sañjānāti devede pajāpati pajāpatito saṃññatvā pajāpati maññati pajāpatismi maññati pajāpatito maññati pajāpatiṃ meti maññati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi bra
hmaṃ brahmato saṃjānāti brahmaṃ brahmato saṃmaññatvā brahmaṃ maññati brahmasmi maññati brahmato maññati brahmaṃ meti maññati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassara
to sañjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saṃññatvā ābhassare maññati ābhassaresu maññati ābhassarato maññati ābhassare meti maññati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sañjānāti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato saṃññatvā subhakiṇhe maññati subhakiṇhesu maññati subhakiṇhato maññati subhakiṇhe meti maññati subhakiṇhe
abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassa ti vaṃdāmi vehapphale vehapphalato sañjānāti vehapphale vehapphalato saṃññatvā vehapphale maññati vehapphalesu maññati vehapphalato ma
ññati vehapphale meti maññati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto sañjānāti abhibhūṃ abhibhūto saṃññatvā abhibhūṃ maññati abhi
bhūsmī maññati abhibhūto maññati abhibhuṃ meti maññati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ākāsānañjāyatanaṃ ākāsānañjāyatanato sañjānāti ākāsānañjā
yatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato saṃññatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃsmiṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanato maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ abhi
nandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato sañjānāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanato saññatvā viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ maññati viññāṇañcāyatanasmi maññati vaññā
ṇañcāyatanato maññati āva viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanato sañjānāti ākiñcaññāya
tanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanato ññaṃññatvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanasmi maññati ākiñcaññāyatanato maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññā
taṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato sañjānāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saṃññatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maññati nevasaññānāsaññā
yatanasmi maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kassa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
diṭṭhaṃ diṭṭhato sañjānāti diṭṭhaṃ
diṭṭhato saṃññatvā diṭṭhaṃ maññati diṭṭhasmi maññati diṭṭhato maññati diṭṭhaṃ meti maññati diṭṭhaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato sañjānāti sutaṃ sutato saṃññatvā su
taṃ maññati sutasmi maññati sutato maññati sutaṃ meti maññati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi mutaṃ mūtato sañjānāti mūtaṃ mūtato saṃññatvā mū
taṃ maññati mūtasmi maññati mūtato maññati mūtaṃ meti maññati mūtaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññātaṃ viññātato sañjānāti viññātaṃ viññāta
to saṃññatvā viññātaṃ maññati viññātasmi maññati viññātato maññati viññātaṃ meti maññati viññātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi
ekattaṃ ekattato sañjā
nāti ekattaṃ ekattato saṃññatvā ekattaṃ maññati ekattasmi paññati ekattato maññati ekattaṃ meti maññati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato sañjānāti
nānattaṃ nānattato saññatvā nānatthaṃ maññati nānattasmi maññati nānattato maññati nānattaṃ meti maññati nānatthaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassa ti vadāmi sabbaṃ sabbato sañjānāti sabbaṃ sabba
to saṃññatvā sabbaṃ maññati sabbasmi maññati sabbato maññati sabba meti maññati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbānato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato saṃññatvā nibbānaṃ
maññati nibbānasmi maññati nibbānato maññati nibbānaṃ meti maññati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi puthujjanavasena pathamanayabhummiparicchedo niṭṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave
bhikkhu sekho apattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati sopi pathaviṃ pathavīto abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ mā maññi pathaviyā mā maññi pathavito mā maññi pathavī meti mā maññi
pathavi māabhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññeyyaṃ tassa ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyata
naṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ mā maññi nibbānasmi mā maññi nibbānato mā
maññi nibbānaṃ meti mā maññi nibbānaṃ mābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhavasena dutiyanayabhumiparicchedo niṭṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇā
savo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammādaññā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavīto abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito a
bhiññāya pathaviṃ na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathavī meti na maññati pathavi nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ
brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato a
bhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānato napassati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khiṇā
savavasena tatiyanayabhumiparicchedo niṭṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammādaññā vi
mutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiññāya pathavi na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathavi meti na maññati pathavi nābhīnandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vitarāgattā ...la... ā
paṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ
nānatthaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti maññati nibbānaṃ nābhidandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rādhassa vitarāgattā khiṇā
savavasena catutthanaya bhummiparicchedo niṭṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhū arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇi ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammādaññā vimu
tto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathaviṃ meti na maññati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā
dosassa vitadosattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ āpabhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāya
tanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānatthaṃ saṃbbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānaṃto na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbā
naṃ nābhinanandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vitadosattā khiṇāsavavasena pañcamanayabhummiparicchedo niṭṭhito
yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhū arahaṃ khiṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇiyo ohita
bhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhiṇabhavasaṃyojano sammādaññā vimutto sopi pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito atiññāya pathaviṃ na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathaviṃ me
ti na maññati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vitamohattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ vi
viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcīcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññāṇaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na mañña
ti nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vitamohattā khiṇāsavavasena chaṭṭhanayabhumiparicchedo niṭṭhito
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammā sambuddho pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhi
ññāya pathaviṃ na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathaviṃ meti na maññati pathaviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassa ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhute deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhaki
ṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ ākiñcaññā yatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānatthaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya ni
bbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamanayabhumiparicchedo niṭṭhito
tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho pathaviṃ pathavito abhijānāti pathaviṃ pathavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ na maññati pathaviyā na maññati pathavito na maññati pathaviṃ meti na maññati pathaviṃ
nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu nandiṃ dukkhassa mulanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa janarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambho
dhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi la āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhute deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare ...la... ekatthaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmi na maññati nibbānato na mañña
ti nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kīsa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti vinditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa erāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ kharāyā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sa
mmāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi satthuvasena aṭṭhamanayabhummiparicchedo niṭṭhitho idamavoca bhagavā attamanā te bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsita abhinandantīti sabbadhamma mulapariyāyasuttantaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ pathamaṃ
